pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast and Light Package to Compute Polygenic Risk Scores // Quickly computes polygenic scores from GWAS summary statistics of either case-control or quantitative traits, without LD matrix computation or parameter tuning. Reales,G., Kelemen,M., Wallace,C. (2020) doi:10.1101/2020.07.24.220392 "RpidoPGS: A rapid polygenic score calculator for summary GWAS data without validation dataset".
